txt.en: 'All shall bow before the might of Mordor, fool! You dare not defy the Dark Lord!'
'Nooo!!'
'Warg Riders! Time to make a hasty exit.'
'Ah, so here we are! What a marvellously constructed place this is. But... I fear there are enemies all around us. I will do my best to help you clear them out.'
'You did very well, my friend! Thank you for your help. I would not have been able to face so many goblins alone.'
'It seems there are quite a few of them in here - prepare yourself!.'
'Hah. Well, that was two birds with one stone now, wasn't it?'
'The Eye sees all! You shall scream in the halls of Lugb√ªrz for your treachery!'
'There! Do you see that, across there! What are they doing? We'll need to get closer... eh?'
'And little love lost between the goblins of Mordor and Moria it would seem! So much the better.'
'Look out! Behind us!'
Slagvi has joined you in the cooling chamber
'But wait! The howling of Wargs... riders! It's a trap! Run!'
Slagvi is ready to begin the investigation of the cooling chamber
Slagvi has been called
The chieftain has fallen, and the remaining goblins scatter in terror. The cooling chamber is safe for now.
Slagvi has been summoned
Fixed the jammed lever
Fixed the rusted gear
Slagvi wishes to investigate failure of the water systems in the Great Delving, and he believes the source of the trouble is in the cooling chamber itself.
Fixed the stuck wheel
Summoned Slagvi
'Almost there. Just a few more stairs.'
Use the summoning horn to call Slagvi
Talk to Slagvi
Find and defeat the Moria chieftain
'Quickly! We haven't much time!'
Fix the jammed lever
'We have little time before reinforcements arrive!'
Repair the rusted gear
'No dawdling! I can hear more of them coming!'
Repair the stuck wheel
'No time to rest! Onwards! I will meet you at the door!'
'These halls belong to Mazog, you dog of Mordor! Now die!'
Talk to Slagvi
'Now that they've seen us, we must move swiftly!'
Exit the cooling chamber
(A summoning horn can be used at any time to call Slagvi to your side)
'We made it! Time to return to camp and report back what we found here.'
A summoning horn stands at the front of the cooling chamber.\n\nThe summoning horn can be used to call Slagvi to your side.
The cooling chamber has been repaired
Slagvi is at your side in the cooling chamber.\n\nYou should speak with Slagvi.
Slagvi wants the goblin-leader who has claimed the cooling chamber found and defeated.
The items to repair can be found at the back of the cooling chamber.
Talk to Slagvi. You can summon him if you become separated.
It is time to exit the cooling chamber.
'Foul creatures. Let us run them through and reclaim what is ours.'
'So, you come to demand the fealty of Moria!?'
'Such is the fate of all fools!'
Instance: The Cooling Chamber
